SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Advance
Represents an Advance order in the game, which moves armies from a source country to a target country.
AdvanceOrderTest
The type Advance order test.
Card
The Card interface represents a playing card in the game model, and it extends the Orders interface.
CardAirlift
The CardAirlift class represents an Airlift card in the game.
CardAirliftTest
The type Card airlift test.
CardBlockade
Represents a Blockade card in the game, allowing the player to apply a blockade on a specified country.
CardBlockadeTest
The type Card blockade test.
CardBomb
Represents a Bomb card in the game, which allows a player to reduce the armies in an enemy country by half.
CardBombTest
The type Card bomb test.
CardNegotiate
Represents a Negotiate Card in the game, used by players to form temporary alliances.
CardNegotiateTest
The type Card negotiate test.
CommandHandler
Handles and parses commands and operations.
CommandValidationException
Custom exception class to handle command validation errors.
Continent
Represents a Continent containing multiple countries with associated metadata.
ContinentTest
The type Continent test.
Country
The Country class represents a country with an ID, name, continent ID, neighboring countries, and armies.
CountryTest
The type Country test.
CurrentState
The CurrentState class represents the current state of the game, including the list of players, the game map, and other relevant information such as the number of turns, strategies, and tournament mode status.
CurrentStateTest
The type Current state test.
Deploy
Represents a Deploy order in the game, where a player deploys armies to a country.
DeployTest
The type Deploy test.
GameLogger
The GameLogger class listens for changes to the message in ModelLogger and writes the updated message to a log file.
IssueOrderPhase
Represents the Issue Order Phase of the game.
MainGameEngine
The MainGameEngine class serves as the main controller for handling game commands and logic.
MainGameEngineTest
Unit tests for MainGameEngine class.
Map
Represents a map containing countries and continents.
MapController
Controller Class MapController.
MapControllerTest
The type Map controller test.
MapTest
The type Map test.
MapView
The MapView class provides a visual representation of the game map, including continents and countries.
MapViewTest
 
ModelLogger
The type Model logger.
OrderExecutionPhase
Represents the Order Execution Phase in the game.
OrderExecutionPhaseTest
The type Order execution phase test.
Orders
Interface representing a generic order in the game.
OrdersTest
The type Orders test.
Phase
Abstract class representing a phase in the game engine.
PhaseTest
The type Phase test.
Player
Represents a player in the game.
PlayerController
The PlayerController class manages player actions such as assigning countries, distributing armies, and creating orders.
PlayerControllerTest
The type Player controller test for the new map.
PlayerTest
The type Player test.
ProjectConstants
The ProjectConstants class defines a set of constant strings used throughout the project.
StartupPhase
Represents the Startup Phase of the game.
